attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We have no more money left to give!
Taxing is not the answer to our problems Mr Blair it is what you do with the money we already give you that matters.  Manage your accounts better!

rejection.details:
There are lots of petitions on this topic:
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/search?q=tax
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
